Kerrigan.name: Ravage
Kerrigan.description: Leap to a target, dealing 130 (+4% per level) damage. If the enemy dies within 1.5 seconds, restore 1 charge and refund 20 Mana.

Kerrigan.name: Impaling Blades
Kerrigan.description: After 1.25 seconds, deal 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area, stunning them for 1 second.

Kerrigan.name: Primal Grasp
Kerrigan.description: Pulls enemies within the target area towards Kerrigan, dealing 25 (+4% per level) damage. After 2.5 seconds, an explosion occurs around Kerrigan, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

Kerrigan.name: Summon Ultralisk
Kerrigan.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon an Ultralisk that rushes forward upon spawning, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  The Ultralisk's Basic Attacks deal 50% of their damage in an area around their target. Reactivate to retarget the Ultralisk.

Kerrigan.name: Maelstrom
Kerrigan.description: Deals 74 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.

Kerrigan.name: Assimilation
Kerrigan.description: Gain 15% of damage dealt from Basic Attacks and Abilities as Shields for 6 seconds. Shield amount gained doubled against Heroes.  Current maximum: 1004 (+4% per level)

1.name: Siphoning Impact
1.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Ravage grants 90 (+4% per level) points of Assimilation Shields.

1.name: Assimilation Mastery
1.description: Regeneration Globe healing grants 40 (+4% per level) points of Assimilation Shields per second while active. While Assimilation is active, Kerrigan's Health and Mana regeneration is increased by 100%.

1.name: Fury of the Swarm
1.description: Gain 10% more Assimilation Shields from Basic Attacks. After casting Ravage, Kerrigan's next 2 Basic Attacks within 3 seconds to splash for 100% damage around the target.

4.name: Sharpened Blades
4.description: Quest: Minions and Heroes that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Ravage increase its damage up to a maximum of 50.  Minions grant 0.5 increased damage and Heroes grant 5 increased damage.  Reward: After reaching a 50 damage increase, Ravage gains 50 additional damage.

4.name: Kinetic Fulmination
4.description: Damaging an enemy increases the damage of Kerrigan's next Impaling Blades within 10 seconds by 15%, up to 150%.

4.name: Psionic Pulse
4.description: Primal Grasp explodes a second time 2.5 seconds after its first explosion.

7.name: Queen of Blades
7.description: Damaging a Hero with Primal Grasp reduces Ravage's cooldown by 4 seconds.

7.name: Boundless Fury
7.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Ravage grants a charge of Ravage. Can only occur once every 10 seconds per Hero.

7.name: Bladed Momentum
7.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Kerrigan's Basic Abilities by 0.6 seconds.

10.name: Maelstrom
10.description: Deals 74 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.

10.name: Summon Ultralisk
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon an Ultralisk that rushes forward upon spawning, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  The Ultralisk's Basic Attacks deal 50% of their damage in an area around their target. Reactivate to retarget the Ultralisk.

13.name: Psionic Barrier
13.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Primal Grasp grants 15 Spell Armor for 4 seconds.

13.name: Volatile Power
13.description: Increase the amount of Assimilation Shields granted from damage dealt by 15%, but reduce duration of Assimilation by 3 seconds.

13.name: Chrysalis
13.description: Activate to place Kerrigan in a Chrysalis with 550 (+4% per level) Health for 5 seconds. While inside, Kerrigan regenerates 5% of her maximum Health per second.  Enemies can destroy the Chrysalis to end its effects early.

16.name: Mounting Potency
16.description: Ravage grants 5% Spell Power for 4 seconds, up to 40%.

16.name: Painful Spikes
16.description: Enemies hit by Impaling Blades take an additional 75 (+4% per level) damage the next 6 times Kerrigan damages them within 5 seconds.

16.name: Unbridled Energy
16.description: Damaging a Hero with a Heroic Ability grants 30% Spell Power for 4 seconds.

20.name: Omegastorm
20.description: Maelstrom's duration is increased by 0.125 seconds every time it damages a Hero.

20.name: Torrasque
20.description: The Ultralisk morphs into an egg when it dies. If the egg isn't killed within 4 seconds, a new Ultralisk is born.

20.name: Assimilation Blades
20.description: Damaging an enemy increases Basic Attack damage by 2% for 5 seconds, up to 40%.

20.name: Psionic Shift
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Generates 300% increased Assimilation Shields from the damage dealt.
